item.title: About
item.description:
Hey you

Since I’ve read so much from other blogs, I thoughts I should share a bit more, get out of my confort zone and share some thougts / experience that may be usefule to others. So here I am, nicolas gailly, a computer scientist guy that likes coding & security. Others things I also am interested in are the international politics (who are our puppet masters??) & our right for freedom of speech and informations on the internet (at what point what I read is OK or not for our dear & lovely leaders).
